en.main_subtitle: This app creates a detailed reading plan in 5 steps and exports it as an `.ics` file for your calendar.
en.date_error: End date must be after start date.
en.speeds_help: It's recommended to test with a brief reading session and time yourself per page to adjust these speeds.
en.speeds_caption: (Choose reading time in seconds per page)
en.books_subtitle: Add the books you want to include in your reading plan.

en.generating: Calculating your reading plan... This may take a moment.
en.error_no_books: Add at least one book to the list!
en.error_no_days: Select at least one reading day per week!

en.books_completed_summary: Summary of Completed Books in Plan
en.no_events_warning: No events generated. Check your configuration or book list.
